TopicTitle: Auk and Gull - small upper stages

Articles.Content:
Two small upper stages made to be complete propulsion and service modules for probes, satellites and landers. Can be independently operated = de-orbited.

RCS is only for roll, pitch and yaw = Not made for anything which requires active docking.

(It can easily be seen that the Gull is not as efficient as if it had been built around a X200-8 tank instead. Or if it had used a LV-909.)

Download

Auk : https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bz81WxkFXuN7X21oTFFnRE8zakk/edit?usp=sharing

Gull: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bz81WxkFXuN7Zy1DcnhfVDFTbFE/edit?usp=sharing
Looks mice. I've never seen anyone do something like this by itself
